name: Episode XI Studios
overview:
As a video provider for the Charlotte episode of ABC’s Extreme Makeover: Home Edition, we have earned the trust of major players in the video and film industry. As a full service digital video production company in Charlotte, NC, we provide service to all Virginia, Tennessee, North Carolina, and South Carolina clients. Our Producers work with savvy marketers to help develop a an effective, visual solution through commercial video production-marketing-advertising, event/meeting planning, and corporate photography (advertising, product, and event).

Our digital video expertise includes productions for website video applications (streaming or download), product demo, HR training and safety videos, sales productions, marketing videos, advertising videos as well as CD/DVD printing and duplication.

Our Meeting/Event Expertise

As an extension to video production and video marketing/advertising, our Certified Meeting Planners are at your disposal to reduce the cost of your next event and ensure a smooth process. We marry both event planning and video production, to ensure that your next sales or training event guarantees a standing ovation.

Our Photography Expertise

Photography is an art form. It takes, not only an understanding of composition, lighting, color theory, and resolution, but also of the complexities of software programs such as Photoshop. Our photographers go through extensive, ongoing training to keep abreast of the trend updates and equipment techniques.
